Divisions — All divisions on record — Senate only (sorted by subject)

A 'division' is parliamentary terminology for a 'vote' (read more...). This page shows divisions in the Australian parliament. Make sure you read the explanation about rebellions, as they may not be what you expect.

Sort by: Date | Subject | Rebellions | Turnout

Date Time Subject Rebels
(explain..) 		Turnout Majority
30 Nov 2009 12:00 Carbon Pollution Reduction Scheme (Cprs Fuel Credits) Bill 2009 [No. 2]; Carbon Pollution Reduction Scheme Amendment (Household Assistance) Bill 2009 [No. 2] — Third Reading 1 73 9
25 Nov 2009 16:13 Carbon Pollution Reduction Scheme Legislation 11 65 31
14 Mar 2013 Motions — Renewable Energy Certificates 0 69 3
30 Dec 2009 12:00 Proceedural ban of flatulence during divisions 0 73 9

About the Project

The Public Whip is brought to you by the not-for-profit OpenAustralia Foundation. It is based on the UK site of the same name.

If you'd like to talk to us about the project, please email us.
